Pre-Game Insights: Gibraltar take on Scotland in Faro on Monday in what will be the third time they play against them since joining UEFA.
Scotland will not be looking at the results but at how their players perform as they prepare for their Euros campaign.
It will be a test for Gibraltar head coach Julio Ribas who will have a chance to test its growing number of young players.
Scotland Head Coach Steve Clarke named his 28-man provisional EURO 2024 squad.
There are two uncapped players included in the Scotland squad: Ross McCrorie and Ben Doak.
James Forrest, who has not represented Scotland for nearly three years, has been included in the 28-man squad.
